Shokaract looks up at Vulois's base.

"Want to wreck this?" Shokaract asked=
.

"Up to battle?" Deemos asked Sharpedge. Deemos seen Plintissa.

'When wi=
ll you stop bawling and take life like it is! Life sucks, get used to it, P=
lintissa." Deemos says. He eys her with all of the intention of a demon tha=
t is dreaming. (Just thought that thay would be apropriate) The Mafia all b=
ow and transform to beast mode. Kracken is a Kracken. Beholder is a Beholde=
r, a strange round creature with antenae and one big eye. Horn Drill Became=
 a Unicorn. Grenade became a Dragon. And finally, Gigas became a Gigas. The=
 5 all watched in their beast modes. Deemos watched the Mafia and was pleas=
ed.

"We shall attack, and there will be no mercy." Shokaract says. Serge l=
oads up some missiles. Shokaract fires at Vulois's base...
